description: On Thursday soap star Gemma Atkinson showed off her gym-honed legs after finishing a workout at her Manchester gym. The 31-year-old actress wore a black hoodie teamed with skin-tight leggings.
title: Gemma Atkinson goes makeup-free following intense gym session
title_page: Gemma Atkinson goes makeup-free following intense gym sessionÂ  | Daily Mail Online
text:
Earlier this month she walked the red carpet at the National Television Awards in a stunning green gown with a thigh-high split.
And on Thursday soap star Gemma Atkinson showed off her gym-honed legs once more after finishing a workout at her gym in Manchester.
The 31-year-old actress wore a black hoodie and t-shirt combo, teamed with skin-tight, spray-on leggings that showed off her envious toned curves.
Nice legs: On Thursday Gemma Atkinson showed off her gym-honed pins in skintight leggings after finishing a workout with her personal trainer at her gym in Manchester
Gemma, who is currently training for the Great Manchester run in May, added a splash of colour with her on-trend, pink and orange Nike trainers.
Despite enduring another gruelling workout session with her personal trainer, Gemma looked fresh-faced and camera-ready - even without any make-up.
Her lightly tanned complexion shone and the icy wind left her cheeks slightly rosy.
Always on: Gemma looked fresh-faced and camera-ready - even without any make-up. Her tanned complexion shone and the icy wind left her cheeks slightly rosy
Black beauty: She wore a black hoodie and t-shirt combo, teamed with on-trend, pink and orange Nike trainers
Her natural glow stems partly from her healthy diet, which includes plenty of water and Ooosh Juice, a blend of fruit and vegetable juices from Manchester-based juice therapist Scott McArthur.
She was seen carrying a bottle of his green juice as she walked to her SUV.
Gemma, who took on the role of Carly on Emmerdale last year following a stint on Hollyoaks and three spin-off series, recently told ITV1 chat show host Lorraine Kelly that her character will have a very busy year.
Staying hydrated: Gemma carried a bottle of water and a bottle of green juice from Ooosh Juice, which is run by Manchester-based juice therapist Scott McArthur
'We hope she'll find someone and settle down, someone who treats her better than Ross did,' she said, referring to her character's torrid on-off romance with bad boy Ross.
Gemma also suggested that revelations about her character's past could re-shape attitudes toward her.
'She's got a few secrets that are going to be coming to light around February time, so people will realise why she was the runway bride and why she was so horrible.'
Peachy posterior: Gemma's leggings emphasised her envious curves and pert bottom
